vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to fence about
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to fence about
1a2) fenced about (participle)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   estar cercado; (b)   deslizarse, caer; (c) nif.   volverse, caer; (d) hif.   desplazar; (e) hof.   ser rechazado
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (Qal) (以圍牆, 籬笆) 圍起來 (歌 7:2; 被動分詞)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (Qal) (以围墙, 篱笆) 围起来 (歌 7:2; 被动分词)
